docs.snippet: Your daily look at late-breaking news, upcoming events and the stories that will be talked about today:...
docs.lead_paragraph: Your daily look at late-breaking news, upcoming events and the stories that will be talked about today:

docs.snippet: The fatal fall of a 29-year-old baseball fan from an upper deck of the Atlanta Braves Turner Field stadium on Monday was an accident, police said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The fatal fall of a 29-year-old baseball fan from an upper deck of the Atlanta Braves Turner Field stadium on Monday was an accident, police said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Fatal Fall in Atlanta Stadium Was Accidental: Police
headline.print_headline: Fatal Fall in Atlanta Stadium Was Accidental: Police

docs.snippet: Adam LaRoche hit a two-run home run in the sixth inning to help lift the Washington Nationals to a 4-2 win over the San Francisco Giants on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Adam LaRoche hit a two-run home run in the sixth inning to help lift the Washington Nationals to a 4-2 win over the San Francisco Giants on Tuesday.

headline.main: LaRoche Homers, Nats Take 4-2 Win Over Giants
headline.print_headline: LaRoche Homers, Nats Take 4-2 Win Over Giants

docs.snippet: Josh Hamilton and the Los Angeles Angels had their chance in the ninth inning against the New York Yankees and didn't have to face Mariano Rivera....
docs.lead_paragraph: Josh Hamilton and the Los Angeles Angels had their chance in the ninth inning against the New York Yankees and didn't have to face Mariano Rivera.

headline.main: Angels Fall Short Against Yanks Minus Rivera
headline.print_headline: Angels Fall Short Against Yanks Minus Rivera
